scripts.local: cross-env PORT=3000 NODE_ENV=development CY_ENV=local nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.dev: cross-env PORT=3000 NODE_ENV=development CY_ENV=dev nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.start_office_dev: HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 cross-env NODE_ENV=production CY_ENV=dev pm2 start --name next_office server/index.js
scripts.restart_office_dev: pm2 delete npd3_dev && HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3000 cross-env NODE_ENV=production CY_ENV=dev pm2 start --name next_office server/index.js
